member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.AdvancedTranslationClient
member.summary: Abstract class providing operations for Google Cloud Translation. This class uses strings for model names, unlike which uses the enum. This makes it less convenient to use for simple cases, but more powerful in allowing arbitrary custom models to be specified.

remarks.para: This abstract class is provided to enable testability while permitting additional operations to be added in the future. See , and to construct instances; alternatively, you can construct a directly from a .
All instance methods declared in this class are virtual, with an implementation which simply throws . All these methods are overridden in .

This class implements ; however, the method only requires calling if many short-lived instances of are being created. Most code would be expected to create a single AdvancedTranslationClient instance, and use this instance throughout the lifetime of the application. In this case, Dispose need not be called.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.AdvancedTranslationClient.Service
member.summary: The underlying translation service object used by this client.
member.remarks: The class only provides convenience operations built on top of an existing service object. Any more complex operations which are not supported by this wrapper may wish to use the same service object as the wrapper, in order to take advantage of its configuration (for authentication, application naming etc).

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.AdvancedTranslationClient.DefaultModel
member.summary: The default translation model used by this client.
member.remarks: Each Translate method has an optional parameter to override this.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.AdvancedTranslationClient.TranslateText(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Translates a single item of text synchronously.
member.remarks: This implementation simply delegates to
member.param: The text to translate.
The code for the language to translate into. Must not be null.
The code for the language to translate from. May be null, in which case the server will detect the source language.
The model to request for translation. May be null, in which case is used. If the empty string is specified, no model is requested, allowing the server to choose.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.AdvancedTranslationClient.TranslateHtml(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Translates a single item of HTML synchronously.

remarks.para: See the [Translation API documentation](https://cloud.google.com/translate/markup) for more details on how to translate HTML and the terms of service.

member.param: The HTML to translate.
The code for the language to translate into. Must not be null.
The code for the language to translate from. May be null, in which case the server will detect the source language.
The model to request for translation. May be null, in which case is used. If the empty string is specified, no model is requested, allowing the server to choose.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.AdvancedTranslationClient.TranslateText(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Translates multiple items of text synchronously.
member.param: The text strings to translate. Must not be null or contain null elements.
The code for the language to translate into. Must not be null.
The code for the language to translate from. May be null, in which case the server will detect the source language.
The model to request for translation. May be null, in which case is used. If the empty string is specified, no model is requested, allowing the server to choose.
member.returns: A list of translations. This will be the same size as , in the same order.

The model to request for translation. May be null, in which case is used. If the empty string is specified, no model is requested, allowing the server to choose.
member.returns: A list of translations. This will be the same size as , in the same order.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.AdvancedTranslationClient.DetectLanguage(System.String)
member.summary: Detects the language of the specified text synchronously.
member.remarks: This implementation simply delegates to .
member.param: The text to detect the language of. Must not be null.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.AdvancedTranslationClient.DetectLanguages(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Detects the languages of the specified text items synchronously.
member.param: The text items to detect the language of. Must not be null or contain null elements.
member.returns: A list of detected languages. This will be the same size as , in the same order.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.AdvancedTranslationClient.ListLanguages(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Lists the language supported by the Translate API synchronously.
member.param: The target language in which to return the language names in the results, for display purposes. May be null, in which case only the language codes are returned.
The model to request languages for. May be null, in which case is used. If the empty string is specified, no model is requested, allowing the server to choose.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.AdvancedTranslationClient.CreateAsync(Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.GoogleCredential,System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously creates a , using application default credentials if no credentials are specified.
member.remarks: The credentials are scoped as necessary.
member.param: Optional .
The default translation model to use. Defaults to null, indicating that by default no model is specified in requests.

member.summary: Creates a from an API key instead of using OAuth2 credentials.
member.remarks: You are encouraged to use OAuth2 credentials where possible. This method is primarily provided to make the transition from using API keys to OAuth2 credentials straightforward.
member.param: API key to use. Must not be null.
The default translation model to use. Defaults to null, indicating that by default no model is specified in requests.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.AdvancedTranslationClientImpl
member.summary: Wrapper around to provide simpler operations.
member.remarks: This is the "default" implementation of . Most client code should refer to , creating instances with , and . The constructor of this class is public for the sake of constructor-based dependency injection.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.AdvancedTranslationClientImpl.ApplicationName
member.summary: The default application name used when creating a . Defaults to "google-cloud-dotnet"; must not be null.
member.remarks: Most applications will never want to set this, which is why it's in this class rather than .

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Detection
member.summary: A result of detecting the language of a piece of text via or , or the multiple-item equivalents.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Detection.Text
member.summary: The text that was used for the input of language detection.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Detection.Language
member.summary: The language code for the detected language.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Detection.Confidence
member.summary: The confidence level (between 0 and 1) of the detection.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Detection.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.param: The text that was used for the input of language detection.
The detected language code.
The confidence of the detection.
The reliability of the detection.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Language
member.summary: A language supported by the Google Cloud Translation API.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Language.Name
member.summary: The descriptive name of the language, e.g. "English". May be null if no target language was provided when requesting the supported languages.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Language.Code
member.summary: The code to use for the language when providing this to the API as a source or target language.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Language.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.param: The name of the language. May be null.
The code of the language. Must not be null.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.LanguageCodes
member.summary: A helper class with constants for supported language codes. This is simply a code-convenient form of the set of languages returned by . It is regenerated regularly, but not guaranteed to be complete at any moment in time; if the language you wish to use is present in the table but not covered here, please use the listed language code as a hard-coded string until this class catches up.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationClient
member.summary: Abstract class providing operations for Google Cloud Translation.

remarks.para: This abstract class is provided to enable testability while permitting additional operations to be added in the future. See , and to construct instances; alternatively, you can construct a directly from a .
All instance methods declared in this class are virtual, with an implementation which simply throws . All these methods are overridden in .

This class implements ; however, the method only requires calling if many short-lived instances of are being created. Most code would be expected to create a single TranslationClient instance, and use this instance throughout the lifetime of the application. In this case, Dispose need not be called.

member.summary: The underlying translation service object used by this client.
member.remarks: The class only provides convenience operations built on top of an existing service object. Any more complex operations which are not supported by this wrapper may wish to use the same service object as the wrapper, in order to take advantage of its configuration (for authentication, application naming etc).

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationModel
member.summary: Underlying model used by the Google Cloud Translation API. This can be explicitly specified on a per-client or per-method basis. See https://cloud.google.com/translate/release-notes for on-going changes and new models.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationModel.ServiceDefault
member.summary: Explicitly allow the API service to decide which model to use.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationModel.Base
member.summary: The "base" model. The exact meaning of this model may change over time.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationModel.NeuralMachineTranslation
member.summary: The Neural Machine Translation model ("nmt") provides higher quality results where available, but is computationally intensive.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationResult
member.summary: The result of a translation operation.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationResult.OriginalText
member.summary: The original text (or HTML) that was translated.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationResult.DetectedSourceLanguage
member.summary: The source language code detected by the server. This may be null, typically due to the source language being supplied by the caller.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationResult.SpecifiedSourceLanguage
member.summary: The source language code supplied by the caller, if any.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationResult.TargetLanguage
member.summary: The target language code that the text was translated into.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationResult.Model
member.summary: The model used to perform the translation, if known and available as one of the values in .

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationResult.ModelName
member.summary: The name of the model used to perform the translation. This may be present even if is null, if a custom model name has been specified via .
